derivation: from H6117 (עָקַב) in the sense of H6119 (עָקֵב);
outline:
1. consequence
    1. consequence
    2. consequence, gain, reward
    3. end
  2. as a consequence, because, consequently
  3. as a consequence of, that, because
kjv_def: [idiom] because, by, end, for, if, reward.
strongs_def: a heel, i.e. (figuratively) the last of anything (used adverbially, for ever); also result, i.e. compensation; and so (adverb with preposition or relatively) on account of
